statement.tex: \text{Find the integral of the function}\\ \sin^3 x \cos^3 x \\

step.reason: \sin^3 x \cdot \cos^3 x = (1- \cos^2 x)\cdot \sin x\cos x\cdot \cos^2 x \\ \cos^2 x=t \implies 2\cdot\cos x\sin x\cdot dx=dt\\ \therefore\int \sin^3 x \cos^3 x dx =\int\dfrac{1}{2} t(t -1)dt
\int x^n dx = \dfrac{x^{n+1}}{n+1} + C \\ \text{ where C is the constant of integration.}
